description:
The Granary Long Sleeve Pocket Tee is an everyday wardrobe staple designed with a casual relaxed fit and the natural benefits of 100% pure merino wool. Soft, breathable, and odor-resistant, this versatile tee is all about everyday comfort and style, with a ribbed neckline and classic chest pocket that complete the look.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the incredible performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to synthetic clothing based on petrochemicals. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Granary SS Pocket Tee - Mens
